properties.name: PIH_DEPOSIT_NEW
longdescription: Set to true whenever deposits are applicable from now on
until further notice. This will distinguish old deposits
entered prior to the addition of new field
pih_deposit_os from, new ones where a zero oustanding
deposit is used to indicate it is fully used up.

properties.name: PIH_DEPOSIT_RTN
longdescription: This only applies if the return
done by advice note rather than invoice

properties.name: PIH_DEPOSIT_RTN_DATE
longdescription: This only applies if the return
done by advice note rather than invoice

properties.name: PIH_DEP_CASH_ALLOC
properties.description: Deposit on cash reps-0=no,1=on eod rep
properties.selectionlist: 1 2 0  Entries "Not printed", "Printed on end of day"

properties.name: PIH_SB_ON_EOD
properties.description: Self Bill Printed  EOD-0=no,1=on eod rep
properties.selectionlist: 1 2 0  Entries "Not printed", "Printed on end of day"
